# ğŸš« AI Assistance Constraints

## ğŸ“ .technologies/ Directory
The contents of the `.technologies/` directory are **TEMPLATES ONLY** and are not part of the active project's implementation. They are provided as reference material to help the user set up the project initially based on different technology stacks.

### ğŸ›‘ Restrictions for AI Assistants
AI assistants (including GitHub Copilot) are strictly forbidden from:
- Utilizing files within the `.technologies/` folder as context for the current project.
- Treating documents in that folder as applicable to the active codebase.
- Referencing or applying patterns from those files unless explicitly requested by the user.
